H0.text: Which native British wildlife includes species called Water, Common and Pygmy. Mouse

H1.text: Which native British wildlife includes species called Water, Common and Pygmy. Bat

H2.text: Which native British wildlife includes species called Water, Common and Pygmy. Vole

H3.text: Which native British wildlife includes species called Water, Common and Pygmy. Shrew

A4.text: Shrews are distributed almost worldwide, with native populations absent only in New Guinea, Australia, New Zealand, and South America (except for the northern Andes).

A5.text: The common shrew (Sorex araneus) is explicitly named in the text as a species.
